View Javadoc
1   package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.strategy;
2   
3   import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.regions.EhcacheTransactionalDataRegion;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.Settings;
5   
6   
7   /**
8    * @author Alex Snaps
9    */
10  public class ItemValueExtractor extends AbstractReadWriteEhcacheAccessStrategy {
11  
12  
13  	/**
14  	 * Creates a read/write cache access strategy around the given cache region.
15  	 */
16  	public ItemValueExtractor(EhcacheTransactionalDataRegion region, Settings settings) {
17  		super(region, settings);
18  	}
19  
20  
21  	public static <T> T getValue(final Object entry) {
22  		if(!(entry instanceof Item)) {
23  			throw new IllegalArgumentException("Entry needs to be of type " + Item.class.getName());
24  		}
25  		return (T)((Item)entry).getValue();
26  	}
27  }
